TopicTitle: (.90) How do action groups work now and how to toggle symmetry?

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

How do you assign a number command now? Before you simply clicked the number and whatever command you want that number to execute... but there is no numbers in the action group list anymore.

Also, I found that when I hit F in build mode it says I am toggling vessel or part symmetry, but it is always vessel. Am I doing something wrong or is this another bug...

And is there a hotkey for radial symetry? Thanks.
To toggle between SPH and VAB symetry, you press R.

Thanks for the tip man

[EDIT] and action groups are unlocked via upgrades! lol?

Edited December 17, 2014 by TheBarnetts

They are now.

You have to upgrade the VAB and/or the SPH, depending on where you build the ship that needs them.
You need to upgrade the VAB to lvl 3 to have the proper action groups we were used to. With the VAB lvl 2 you've got the "basics" (eg: gears, brakes and so on).
@Signo: i got the basics (gears, brakes and lights) with the lvl1 as i remember correct and got action groups with lvl2... i dont have lvl3 because i'm a bad manager and broke
I was meaning the "basic" action groups, not the basic components. You can just customize the "basic commands" like toggle gears, toggle lights ans stuff like that with the VAB/SPH at lvl 2.
